column2: You leave the club with your lover and head to your wedding venue.
You both dress up in wedding dresses and exchange a long embrace.
The bridemaids meet you there and celebrate your official union.
You both vow to love, cherish, and take care of each other forever.
You exchange wedding rings and a long and wonderful French kiss.
You're official declared wife and wife.  The crowd cheers and applause.
The wedding party starts, and everyone seems to have a good time.
It doesn't take very long until the bridemaids get in tight bondage.
You head back to your private room to celebrate your honeymoon.
